content.stem: (photo) Choose the statement that best describes the picture.

choices.A: A man is taking money from an ATM machine.
choices.B: A child is feeding ducks at a pond.
choices.C: A worker is stacking boxes on a shelf.
choices.D: A receptionist is speaking with a visitor at a front desk.

transcript.speaker: N
transcript.text: Statement A. A man is taking money from an ATM machine.

transcript.speaker: N
transcript.text: Statement D. A receptionist is speaking with a visitor at a front desk.

content.rationale: The correct sentence describes a receptionist and a visitor at an office desk. The others are not reception scenes.
